channel.title: API on Adam's Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in API on Adam's Analysis

item.title: What I've Learned Working With Facebook's API
item.description: The Situation As part of my analysis for my mom’s bakery, one of the questions that my mom has asked is how does social media affect revenue and number of transactions. To answer her question, I have been learning to pull data from Facebook’s API. I have learned so much! Here are some of the things that I wish I knew when I first started. Facebook’s API Structure Facebook’s API is set up in a graph structure.
